snippet: Mr. Tabucchi, a distinguished Italian novelist, wrote novels that became a standard held aloft by opponents of the right-wing government of former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi.
abstract: Antonio Tabucchi, a distinguished Italian novelist whose work became a standard held aloft by opponents of the right-wing government of former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi, dies at age 68.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Tabucchi, a distinguished Italian novelist, wrote novels that became a standard held aloft by opponents of the right-wing government of former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi.

headline.seo: Antonio Tabucchi, Elegiac Italian Writer, Dies at 68
headline.main: Antonio Tabucchi, Elegiac Italian Writer, Dies at 68
headline.print_headline: Antonio Tabucchi, Elegiac Italian Writer, Dies at 68
